name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Up Arrow to Edit Last Message on WA Web app
name.es: Flecha Arriba para Editar el Ãšltimo Mensaje en WA Web app

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Edit your last message on WA Web app by pressing the Up Arrow key.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to edit your last sent message on WA Web app by pressing the Up Arrow key when the focus is on the message input field.

The extension does not collect or transmit any user data.

The code has no dependencies and does not use any third-party libraries.

You can see the source code on GitHub: https://github.com/valentincostam/up-arrow-edit-last-message
long.es: This extension allows you to edit your last message on WhatsApp web app by pressing the Up Arrow key when the focus is on the input field where you type the messages.
